description:
This coverage shows digital elevation model of the NMC region. The data was derived from Consortium for Spatial Information (CGIAR-CSI) archive as single tiles that were seamlessly combined and clipped to the NMC region extent.
The coverage has also been styled to illustrate elevation up-to 100 meter thereby depicting low lying areas of the NMC.\
Jarvis, A., H.I. Reuter, A. Nelson, E. Guevara, 2008, Hole-filled SRTM for the globe Version 4, available from the CGIAR-CSI SRTM 90m Database (http://srtm.csi.cgiar.org).
name: Northern Mozambique 90 meter DEM
